sentences.en: Forcible sex offenses, for instance, are still underreported - particularly at smaller schools, according to Carter.
sentences.cn: 据卡特说, 比如性暴力侵犯, 仍得不到上报,在小规模学校尤其如此.

sentences.en: Forcible subjection of Aborigines to police rule.
sentences.cn: 五.对原住民族实施强制性的[警察统治]暴力.

sentences.en: How forcible are right words! but what doth your arguing reprove?
sentences.cn: 25正直的言语力量何其大. 但你们责备是责备什么 呢 .

sentences.en: How forcible are right words! but what doth your reprove?
sentences.cn: 25正直的言语力量何其大! 但你们责备是责备甚么 呢 ?

sentences.en: Is there any sign of forcible entry into or out of the premises?
sentences.cn: 居所是否有留下任何匪徒强行进入/出痕迹?

sentences.en: Is there any sign of forcible entry or exit at the premises?
sentences.cn: 是否有任何强行进入或退出该楼宇之痕迹?

sentences.en: It is because of this forcible possessive act that kamma is obliged to produce its results.
sentences.cn: 因为这种强有力的执取行为,业才产生果报.

sentences.en: Reports are coming in of the forcible resettlement of villagers from the countryside into towns.
sentences.cn: 不断有报道称村民被强制从农村迁入城镇定居。

sentences.en: signs of forcible entry into the building
the forcible overthrow of the government
The police checked all windows and doors for signs of forcible entry.
sentences.cn: 警察检查了所有的门窗以寻找强行闯入的痕迹。

sentences.en: The police had to a forcible entry into the house.
sentences.cn: 警察不得不强行进入该“屋”.

sentences.en: The police had to make a forcible entry into the house where the thief was hiding.
sentences.cn: 警察不得不强行进入小偷藏身的那座房子.

sentences.en: The police had to make a forcible entry into the house.
sentences.cn: 警察不得不强行进入该屋.

sentences.en: These two kinds of powers reflect that the Civil forcible execution has the judicature and administrating.
sentences.cn: 这两种权力反映出民事强制执行权兼具有司法性和行政性.

sentences.en: Vomiting: Forcible ejection of the stomach contents from the mouth, usually following nausea.
sentences.cn: 呕吐: 胃内容物被迫经口吐出的一种症状.
